subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: Chris Gayle scored a record Cricket World Cup innings of 215 to lead West Indies to a 73-run win over Zimbabwe. Gayle also had a record-equaling 16 sixes in his innings.
snippet: Chris Gayle scored a record Cricket World Cup innings of 215 to lead West Indies to a 73-run win over Zimbabwe. Gayle also had a record-equaling 16 sixes in his innings.
